byline.original: By JAMES C. MCKINLEY JR. and RICHARD SANDOMIR

abstract: She is said to be in talks with the N.F.L. about performing at halftime at the big game.
snippet: She is said to be in talks with the N.F.L. about performing at halftime at the big game.

headline.main: Packers? Patriots? How About Madonna as a Super Bowl Contender?
headline.print_headline: Madonna a Contender For the Super Bowl
